Subjects: Annunciation, songs of; Virgin Mary, Annunciation to
_description: A song of the Annunciation — in 8-line stanzas with the refrain, ‘Ecce ancilla domini’

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
Ecce Ancilla domini
thus seyde the virgine vythute eny vyseWhen gabryll grett hurd
                    gracyouslyhayle be that virgine I preuyd on prysthu shalt conceyue a
                    swete spyce…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…Then seyde the virgine so myldelyHe schal be dyre welcome to
                        meEcce Ancilla domini
CULAdd5943.Note:
Four stanzas: first of 7 lines (ababbab), others of 8 lines
                    (ababbcbc).

NLS1931.First Lines:
Ecce ancilla dominiSeyde þo virgyn withowtyn
                    viceWhen gabriell hur gret graciously…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…At þat worde knot was knytteEcce ancilla
                    domini
